name: Blue VS Orange
description:
Meh 1st 2 player Fighting game ig u can call it.

A piece of beauty  (UwU)_/✨

Playing this game is easy as eating a cake.

use WAD to move the blue stickman and up, left, right arrows to move the orange stickman.

down arrow key to attack as the orange stickman and S to attack as the blue stickman.

also,

F or ctrl to do a fun lil thingy ;P

WARNING this game contains bugs so ya .... HAVE FUNNN!!!! (>u<)
